write.desc: Write out bias correction [biasfield bias-corrected image]?

tpm.desc: Path to tissue probability map file, if empty SPM defaults will be used

ngaus.desc: Number of gaussians for each tissue class

affreg.desc: Initial affine registration, it can be a regularisation type (see spm_maff8) or a 1-6 transformation parameters corresponding to the rigid-body movement (3x translation, 3x rotation)

cleanup.desc: Extracting the brain from segmented images

writecombined.desc: Write outputs masked with a (combination of) thresholded tissue probabilities, [1x6] array of thresholds, negative threshold means upper threshold, zero means exclusion

method.desc: Normalisation method to apply, 'none' omits this step, 'push' and 'pull are only interpreted SPM12 (they give the same output in SPM8)

fwhm.desc: FWHM to apply after normalisation? - only for SPM12

preserve.desc: 0 = preserve concentration (unmodulated), 1 = preserved total (modulated) - only for SPM12/push
